name: Prixel
description: Prixel is an old-school pixel style 2D platformer.It's designed for speed runners, but ordinary people can play it too .
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel core I3 Memory: 255 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 101 MB available space
